name: Smash (itch) (EFDesarrollo)
description:
Smash, Smash, Smash, Smash. . .

Oh! A reader. Sorry, I was so distracted thinking about smash that I didn't notice you.

I mean, this is really addictive... try it, or better not try it, you'll stay just like me. Ripped abs, a face carved by the gods, and a whole host of people in love with me.

Are you willing to assume the consequences?
